name: Jasmine
reason: The convenience of being able to access my bank account at any time of the day and night
pains: Being able to securely access bank information without having to wait in line
The need for an easy way to transfer money between accounts without fees
Having an app that allows customer support to be reached quickly and easily
The need for an easy way to track spending and upcoming bills
bio: Jasmine is a 34-year-old working professional who values convenience and security. She likes to stay on top of her finances and is always looking for ways to make her life easier.
